example.name: Playback Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates how to load a playback file recorded with the realsense SDK
example.author: Intel Corporation

example.name: Record Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates how to record realsense devices samples to a file using the realsense SDK
example.author: Intel Corporation

example.name: Projection Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates usage of the projection interface, which defines mapping between pixel depth and realworld coordinates
example.author: Intel Corporation

example.name: Video Module Synchronized Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates a Synchronized usage of the video module interface, which defines a common way for the RealSense SDK to interacts with middleware module
example.author: Intel Corporation

example.name: Video Module Asynchronized Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates an Asynchronized usage of the video module interface, which defines a common way for the RealSense SDK to interacts with middleware module
example.author: Intel Corporation
